newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombia's peso ends slightly lower at 998.60.
newsitem.headline: Colombia's peso ends slightly lower at 998.60.

text.p: Colombia's peso gave up gains that pushed it to an intraday high of 996 and closed 40 centavos lower at 998.60 in active trading on the country's interbank market, dealers said.

They said dollar-selling by coffee and oil exporters buoyed the peso in early trade, lifting it well above the psychological barrier of 1,000 to the dollar. But the peso came under pressure later in the day from banks and other financial institutions that stepped in to buy cheap greenbacks.
Dealers reported a higher-than-average 316 trades for a total of $118 million.
